explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of hybrid methods combining classical statistical models with neural networks for volatility forecasting, which falls under the umbrella of machine learning.
explanations.neural network: The paper specifically mentions the use of Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) as part of the hybrid method for volatility forecasting.
explanations.deep learning: The use of RNN architectures, including GRU and LSTM, indicates the application of deep learning techniques in the research.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper explicitly states the use of Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) in the hybrid method for forecasting volatility.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper mentions LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) as one of the RNN architectures used in the hybrid model for volatility forecasting.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is specifically mentioned as one of the RNN architectures employed in the research for improving volatility forecasts.
